verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During a monologue on his Fox News show Thursday] , [ARG0: Neil Cavuto] [V: called] out [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: for railing against " fake news " while constantly giving them ammunition with his inconsistent and often contradictory statements] .

During a monologue on his Fox News show Thursday , Neil Cavuto called out [ARG0: President Donald Trump] for railing against " fake news " while [ARGM-MNR: constantly] [V: giving] [ARG2: them] [ARG1: ammunition with his inconsistent and often contradictory statements] .
